reason: Question asks about '필수 확인 사항' (required checks) for 회의소집 administrative processing - source only states '위원장이 이를 소집한다'. Answer is a raw dump of the entire 인사위원회 운영 section, duplicating q_1_1296/1301.
Question asks about '자주 질의하는 내용' (frequently asked questions) from 교육청 - fabricated premise not found in source material. Answer is another raw dump of the full section ignoring the question.
Bad question - asks about '기간 계산' (period calculation) for 위원회 구성, but source page 98 contains no such time period info. Answer discusses 위원장/부위원장 composition without addressing the question.
Bad question - asks about '횟수 제한' (frequency limits) for 위원회 구성 which is not in source. Answer is identical to q_1_1304, dumping the same (가)(나)(다) content without addressing frequency.
Vague question about '유형' (types) of 위원회 구성. Answer is identical raw dump as q_1_1304/1305. Duplicate answer with no meaningful differentiation.

Duplicate answer - identical content to q_1_1304, q_1_1305, q_1_1307. While the question about legal basis is somewhat reasonable, the answer is repeated verbatim across 4 entries making it a duplicate.
Bad question - asks '몇 년까지 가능한가요' (how many years possible) for 위원회 운영 which has no time limit in source. Answer discusses 준용 규정 but does not address any time limit. Question-answer mismatch.
Bad question - asks about '횟수 제한' (frequency limits) for 위원회 운영 not addressed in source. Answer is identical to q_1_1310/1313/1314 - duplicate raw dump.
Vague question - '해당하는 것들' is overly broad and non-specific. Answer is identical raw dump as q_1_1310/1311/1314. Duplicate content.
Question asks about '최근 변경사항' (recent changes) which is not available in the source material. Answer dumps current regulations without mentioning any changes. Unanswerable from source.
